e1.title: Advanced Python Workshop
e1.description: Take your Python skills to the next level! This workshop will cover advanced topics in Python programming.

e2.title: JavaScript for Beginners
e2.description: New to JavaScript? Join us in this event to learn the fundamentals of JavaScript, the most popular programming language for web development.

e3.title: Data Science with R
e3.description: Interested in Data Science? This event will introduce you to data manipulation, analysis and visualization with R.

e4.title: Intro to Machine Learning
e4.description: Dive into the world of Machine Learning in this introductory event. No prior experience required!

e5.title: Web Development with React
e5.description: Learn how to build dynamic web applications using React. Basic knowledge of JavaScript is recommended for this event.

e6.title: Mastering Git and GitHub
e6.description: Want to manage your code efficiently? This event will teach you how to use Git and GitHub for version control.
